title: Internship in Beja
description: This project involved designing and developing a user-friendly interface, integrating  real-time data, and ensuring the app met the needs of the stakeholders.

title: Travelblog
description: The Travelblog application is a school project developed during my 2de year at Thomas More. It was created to enhance my skills in web and mobile development, focusing on creating a platform for users to share their travel experiences and insights.

title: Portfolio
description: Several pages were created with their own purpose. There was a homepage and a contact page, as well as a page to keep track of events.
